alert.note: Alert for North Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN CASS COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Laporte, or 13 miles southeast of Bemidji, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Cass County, including the following locations... Cass Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and will likely reduce visibility on parts of US Hwy 2 near Cass Lake.
